description: Arrival in Paris and evening city tour.
Visit Eiffel Tower and enjoy a Seine River cruise.
Arrive in Tokyo, explore Shibuya Crossing and nearby attractions.
Spend the whole day at Tokyo Disneyland enjoying rides and attractions.
Visit Senso-ji Temple and explore Nakamise Shopping Street.
Take a scenic tour to Mount Fuji and Hakone with a hot spring visit.
Shop in Ginza and Akihabara before heading to the airport.
Explore Fort Kochi, Chinese Fishing Nets, and Kathakali dance performance.
Visit tea plantations, Mattupetty Dam, and Echo Point.
Enjoy a luxurious houseboat cruise through the scenic backwaters.
Relax at Kovalam Beach before heading to the airport.
Arrive in Leh, the capital of Ladakh. Explore Leh Palace, Shanti Stupa, and the local market.
Visit famous monasteries like Hemis, Thiksey, and Shey. Experience the Buddhist culture and traditions.
Embark on a trek to the Nubra Valley through high-altitude desert landscapes and picturesque valleys.
Visit Pangong Lake, famous for its stunning views and blue waters, featured in numerous Bollywood films.

itinerary_name: Adventure Trek to Tso Moriri Lake
description: Trek to Tso Moriri, a high-altitude lake surrounded by majestic mountains. Explore the nearby village of Korzok.
Explore more of Leh's famous attractions including Magnetic Hill, Leh Palace, and the war memorial.
Last day in Leh. Relax before departing for the airport, with scenic views of the Himalayas one last time.
Arrive in Srinagar, enjoy a Shikara ride on Dal Lake, and explore Mughal Gardens including Nishat Bagh and Shalimar Bagh.
Drive to Sonamarg, also known as the 'Meadow of Gold'. Enjoy the views of Thajiwas Glacier and explore the beautiful valley.
Visit Gulmarg, the 'Meadow of Flowers'. Take a ride on the Gondola to the top of Mount Apharwat and enjoy skiing or snowboarding (seasonal).
Head to Pahalgam, visit Betaab Valley and Aru Valley. Enjoy an optional pony ride or a riverside walk along the Lidder River.
Visit the stunning Aharbal Waterfall and take a scenic drive to Shopian for a taste of Kashmirs unique culture and untouched beauty.
Last day in Srinagar. Visit the local market for shopping, and enjoy the morning views of the Himalayas before your departure.
